settings.title: Radical Pan Features
settings.p1: Our attractive, innovative high-rise lip and non-toxic, non-stick coating combine to make cooking easier, less messy, and healthier.
settings.h2: COOL-GRIP STEALTH HANDLE | HARD ANODIZED ALUMINUM
settings.p2: The stealth-grip handle keeps you cool while you cook, preventing heat transfer from the stove with our V-technology while the hard anodized body prevents scratches and corrosion.
settings.h3: USED IN EVERY KITCHEN, ON ANY SURFACE
settings.p3: Chef Oren tested, consumer approved, this pan is perfect for gas, induction, and electric stoves and is safe to cook in ovens up to 500°F.
settings.p4: We went through rigorous (and very expensive) consumer health and safety testing with the FDA, SGS, and NSF. This pan was approved and certified by all three -- the first of its kind.

settings.section_subtitle: The Radical Pan passed the highest worldwide certifications
settings.para1: Research has shown a correlation between exposure to PFOA and adverse health effectos. So unlike some other non-stick pans, we don’t use PFOAs.
settings.para2: Not only PFOA-FREE but also NO PFOS, NO LEAD, and NO CADMIUM. Because we believe that what’s in your food is as important as what your food’s cooked in.
settings.para3: With the Eclipse® Non-stick, you won’t need to add as much butter or any other fats from sticking to the pan. That means all of the flavor, but with fewer calories.
settings.para4: The Radical Pan is tested by the highest standards of health and conductibility. SGS is the world’s leading inspection, verification, testing and certification company.
settings.para5: NSF International is a global independent organization that writes standards, protocols and tests and certifies products to protect the environment.
